title: I Am Still the Great Isis! Nobody Has Ever Yet Lifted My Veil! My Fruit Is the Sun! (Je suis toujours la grande Isis! Nul n'a encore soulevé mon voile! Mon fruit est le soleil!) (plate XIV) from La Tentation de Saint-Antoine
medium: Lithograph from an illustrated book with 22 lithographs on chine appliqué and 21 wood engravings (including wrapper and table of plates)
